**YourLastHost is celebrating the start of Spring with a great new KVM sale**

We are **YourLastHost**, the only web host that **guarantees to be the very last web host that you will ever needt**. 

**A few of our key features:**

- 99.99% uptime guarantee
- 90 day money back guarantee. (one of the longest in the industry!)
- Proactive service status checking. (yes, really!)
- 24/7 Live chat help & support
- Over 2 years in business
- Great reviews & stellar reputation **[CHECK US OUT](http://yourlasthost.repuso.com)**
- Voxility 500GBPS DDoS Protection (Jacksonville only)
- Free VPS migrations - Switch between any of our great locations!

**Special LowEndTalk KVM VPS Spring Sale - Los Angeles, Dallas, Jacksonville, & France**

**LET KVM 256**

- 256 MB RAM
- 256 MB vSwap (Linux only)
- 15 GB RAID-10 Storage
- 1.5 TB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- Pricing: Just $14.95/Year
- **[ORDER HERE](https://clients.yourlasthost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=116)**

**Minimum Host Node Specifications:**

- 2x Intel Xeon E5-2660 CPU (16x 3 GHz)
- 64GB RAM
- 6 x 1TB HDDs
- Hardware RAID-10
- 1Gbps Uplink
